site_name: New Avenue Estate, Including Shepcot House, Beardow Grove, Coverack Close, Oakwood Lodge, Garages To The Rear Of The Lousada Lodge, Hood Avenue Open Space And Cowper Gardens Open Space, London, N14.
description: Non material amendment to application 20/00037/VAR to allow elevational changes to blocks D1-4, E1-2 and F2-4 to include: alterations to sizing and location of windows and doors; roof parapet of Block F2 and swapping door and window locations to block D1, D2, E1.  Removal of 4 No. windows in communal stair areas on Block D; spandrel panels on top floor windows to Block D1, D2 and E1; louvred openings to D4 cycle store and replaced with feature brick detailing on Block D; brick rustication detail to the courtyard of Block E1 and rear communal access door in Block E2 and alterations to private amenity space.  Addition of a louvred grill for to Block D; rain water pipes; louvred panel above the louvred door serving the substation in Block E1; brick recess detail added to the rear of Block F3 and F4 below windows.
